name: Tripball
description:
This Game is a GameJam Project made for the HTK - GameJam - Fireedition.

The Topic was "Arcade".

In this short little game you can play Pinball, or as we lovingly call it, Tripball!

Do small challenges, achieve Highscores and see what kind of magic will happen.

Controls:

  • E / X to interact with machine
  • A+D / LB+RB for the left and right flippers
  • Space / A for Launchers
  • C / Y to Shake the Machine
  • R / B to Reset the Machine
  • Q / MenuButton to get to the scoreboard at the end
